name: Fish for Meaning
description:
Ludum Dare 48 Entry (Theme: Deeper and Deeper)

Fisherman Dave went to sea, searching for answers, but all he found were more questions...

Guide the submarine around, collecting fish and searching for bottles containing messages. Each bottle contains a question. Dive deeper and deeper and find all of the questions. There are 11 levels in total.

Controls

WASD and arrow keys move you left, right, and speed you up and slow you down. You can turn faster when moving slower, and vice versa.
